title: 1140 52 "An Admired Hero - The Warrior of Liberation Who Saves Bonney"Transliteration: "Akogare no Hīrō - Bonī o Sukuu Kaihō no Senshi" (Japanese:憧れのヒーロー ボニーを救う解放の戦士) Yasuhiro Tanabe Atsuhiro Tomioka Nobuyuki Iwai & Keita Saitō August 17, 2025(2025-08-17) 2.3%[54]
transformers_text: 1140 52 An Admired Hero The Warrior of Liberation Who Saves Bonne y Transliteration A koga re no H r Bon o Suk u u Kai h no Senshi Japanese Yasuhiro Tanabe Atsuhiro To mio ka Nobuyuki Iwai Keita S a it August 17 2025 2025 08 17 2 3 54 After his meal Luffy transforms into Fifth Gear to evade the Marines Vega punk contacts Atlas to relay a message to Bonne y who commands the Pacifist as to protect the Straw Hats and aid their escape defying both the Marines and Saturn Vega punk's programming grants Bonne y authority over the Pacifist as surpassing even the Five Elders Enraged Saturn impales Vega punk and orders Ki zar u to kill everyone Ki zar u attacks but Luffy intervenes and punches him away Elsewhere the Iron Giant awakens At Vega punk's side Bonne y notices Luffy's heartbeat matches a tune Kuma taught her and Vega punk believes Luffy is the Sun God Nik a much to Bonne y's big shock As the Marines falter Dor ry and Bro gy arrive on a massive ship from Elba f to assist the Straw Hats hailing Luffy as the Sun God
